verse.name: c1a
verse.lines: And I know, yes, I know,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Jesus’ blood can make
the vilest sinner clean.

verse.name: v1a
v1b
verse.lines:
For He saved the worst
among you,
When He saved a wretch like me.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
To the faint He giveth power,
Thro’ the mountains makes a way

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Findeth water in the desert,
Turns the night to golden day.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
In temptation He is near thee,
Holds the powr’rs of hell at bay;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Guides you to the path of safety,
Gives you grace for ev’ry day.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
He will keep thee while the ages
Roll thro’ out eternity;

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Tho’ earth hinders and hell rages,
All must work for good to thee.
